0.2.0.name: connect20/Nfusionsolutions_NfusionWidgets
0.2.0.description: This extension adds the capability in Magento to add Precious Metals Pricing Widgets to your site using nFusion Solutions' reliable, enterprise-class cloud platform for global financial data.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
